name: Gem of True Sight
lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

descriptions.name: True Sight
descriptions.description: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

descriptions.name: Everlasting
descriptions.description: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
